attributes.additional_details:
Please bring an end to the termination of unborn children.

Allowing the lives of unborn children, especially under the NHS, to be ended, denies them their right to protection and ignores the United Nations 1959 Declaration of the Rights of the Child that states that the child:
"needs special safeguards and care, including appropriate legal protection, before as well as after birth."

Please also promote the health and well-being of pregnant women throughout pregnancy by offering better counseling and support, in particular for those facing difficult circumstances.
